resources.string: In this screen you start a Jammin\' session
In order to play a sound, grab your phone and with your fingers select the "chord", while the "chord" is selected tilt your device as if it was a drum stick!
The background music button switches from play to pause, no need to tilt there…
Once the record button is pressed it will register your moves and a second press will prompt you to save the session
In this screen you can listen to your saved sessions
Play and stop functionality for each project
The playback is by simulating your moves
In This screen you can customize your sounds and layouts
Set background music button will prompt you with your selection of music from your device
Sensitivity selection is a triple option selection: low, medium and high. The lower the sensitivity the harder it is to hit the drum
4 buttons for selection of a "chord" configuration. once a configuration is made you can set the configuration or clear it.
Righty or Lefty button switches betwwen righty and lefty modes.
